data.text: @elisaodonovan Sorry to hear. At least in this day and age you can still follow the world digitally and I’m sure the fur monsters are delighted to have you there all the time
@Ysayn3 @elisaodonovan What throat spray is that please? Im going through the broken glass swallowing stage atm...
@elisaodonovan Sorry to hear you've been struck down, here's to a speedy recovery 🙏
@MsEdwina I’ve almost finished Inventing Anna today 🙈 it could be a lot worse. Feel very grateful that I went this long without getting it

@elisaodonovan Oh no I hope you feel better soon,we all had it at Christmas it was tough going. I'm still exhausted, joys of long covid. Netflix, Disney+ or Prime might help the long days. I found it helpful even though I couldn't concentrate much on it.
@elisaodonovan Hope you will feel better soon,Elisa.
@elisaodonovan O dear. Mind yourself Elisa and I hope you feel better soon x
